commit.message:
[multiple changes]

2016-01-24  Dominique d'Humieres <dominiq@lps.ens.fr>

	PR fortran/68283
	* primary.c (gfc_variable_attr): revert revision r221955,
	call gfc_internal_error only if there is no error.

2016-01-24  Dominique d'Humieres  <dominiq@lps.ens.fr>

	PR fortran/68283
	gfortran.dg/pr68283.f90: New test.

From-SVN: r232775
